body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Michael Henderson, and I'm with Rhythm & Notes Music Store. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Oh, hi! Yes, my name is Martha Lee.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Martha! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Well, I've encountered an issue. It seems like some of my purchase history is missing from my online account. I'm quite surprised; I thought these things were automated.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that can be surprising, Martha. To better assist you, may I have two pieces of personal information: your email address and the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. My email is martha.lee@example.com, and the last four digits are one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that, Martha. It will help us identify the issue with your account. I will look into this problem right away.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Michael. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's my pleasure, Martha. We’ll make sure to update you as soon as we've fixed the issue. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that will be all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Martha! Thank you for your time and for contacting Rhythm & Notes Music Store. Have a great day!
